nodes.text: The Art of Star Wars Galaxy
The Art of Star Wars Galaxy is a book showcasing the artwork from Topps' Star Wars Galaxy trading card set by various artists. It was published in 1993. The book includes a foreword by George Lucas.

A one-of-a-kind, 132-page collection of diverse, contemporary art celebrating the Star Wars trilogy - the most entertaining and popular film saga of our time. A must for film buffs... art aficionados... comic fans... trading card collectors... STAR WARS enthusiasts. NEW VISIONS of the STAR WARS galaxy by today's leading comics and fantasy illustrators
